body.context: The Workflow Settings page enables you to define the settings related to workflow transitions.

li.p: In the module menu, click Administration.
In the navigation pane, expand System Configurations, and then click Workflow Settings.
The WORKFLOW SETTINGS page is displayed.
Provide the required information in the fields, as described in the following table.

row.entry: Max size of Document to attach during Workflow action (in MB)

Enter the maximum size of the attachment that can be uploaded during a workflow transition. For attachments during workflow transitions, this value takes precedence over the maximum file size defined in the Max allowable Document Size in Attachment (in MB) in the Application Settings page. For information on application settings, refer to .
Default Mail Body Template for Workflow Notification

Select the appropriate mail body template to send a standard automated email notification to the action stakeholders of the subsequent stage whenever the workflow action is performed. â€‹
Available options are templates defined for the form in the Mail Body Templates catalog of the library.
Default Days to Complete an Action

Enter the number of days before which an action must be performed in the current workflow stage. When you configure properties for a workflow stage, the defined number is used as a default. For information on creating workflows, refer to Creating a Workflow.
Send a reminder prior to due date
Select the check box to send a reminder email to the stakeholders with the due date details.

entry.note: This field is displayed if the Send a reminder prior to due date check box is selected.
entry.p: Enter the number of days prior to due date on which a reminder email is sent to the action stakeholders with the due date details. The due date is defined in the Days to Complete field in the stage properties pane of the Workflow Management page. For information on creating workflows, refer to Creating a Workflow.

entry.note: This field is displayed if the Send a reminder prior to due date check box is selected.
entry.p: Select the appropriate mail body template for the reminder email. Available options are templates defined for the form in the Mail Body Templates catalog of the library.

row.entry: Send reminder to action stakeholders past due date

Select the check box to send a reminder email after the due date is crossed if the stakeholder does not perform a workflow action. The due date is defined in the Days to Complete field in the stage properties pane of the Workflow Management page. For information on creating workflows, refer to Creating a Workflow.

entry.note: This field is displayed if the Send reminder to action stakeholders past due date check box is selected.
entry.p: Select the appropriate mail body template for the reminder email. Available options are templates defined for the form in the Mail Body Templates catalog of the library.

row.entry: Show Workflow History in Details Report
Select the check box to add the Workflow History section in the Details Report.
